summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Volunteer Registration and Marshal Dashboard features. All 30 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all features working correctly including volunteer registration form, marshal login, dashboard tabs (Overview, Volunteers, Attendance, Users), approve/reject workflow, attendance marking, CSV export, and user management.

issues: Image URL contains 'emergentagent.com' CDN domain but this is NOT visible to users - only in source code. The actual visible branding shows 'The Kenya Open' logo and 'Marshal Dashboard' text which is correct.

passed_tests: API Health Check - /api/health returns healthy status
Volunteer Stats Endpoint - /api/volunteers/stats returns marshal/scorer counts
Volunteer Registration - Successfully creates new volunteer with all fields
Duplicate Email Rejection - Returns 400 for duplicate email
Consent Validation - Returns 400 when consent not given
Scorer Role Registration - Successfully registers scorer role
Marshal Login Success - chiefmarshal/MKO2026Admin! credentials work
Invalid Credentials Rejection - Returns 401 for wrong credentials
Unauthenticated Access Rejection - /marshal/me returns 401 without auth
Authenticated Profile Access - /marshal/me returns user data with valid session
Marshal Logout - Successfully invalidates session
Dashboard Stats - Returns total, pending, approved, rejected counts
Volunteers List - Returns all volunteers with filtering support
Filter by Status - Correctly filters by pending/approved/rejected
Filter by Role - Correctly filters by marshal/scorer
Approve Volunteer - Successfully changes status to approved
Reject Volunteer - Successfully changes status to rejected
Mark Attendance Present - Successfully marks volunteer as present
Mark Attendance Late - Successfully marks volunteer as late
Mark Attendance Absent - Successfully marks volunteer as absent
Get Attendance by Date - Returns attendance for specific date
Export Volunteers CSV - Returns CSV file with volunteer data
Export Attendance CSV - Returns CSV file with attendance data
List Marshal Users - Returns all marshal dashboard users
Create Marshal User - Successfully creates new user
Duplicate Username Rejection - Returns 400 for existing username
Viewer Cannot Approve - Returns 403 for viewer trying to approve
Viewer Cannot Create Users - Returns 403 for viewer trying to create users
Viewer Can View Volunteers - Viewers have read access to volunteer list
UI: Volunteer Registration Form - All fields work correctly
UI: Volunteer Registration Submission - Form submits and shows success page
UI: Marshal Login - Login form works with correct credentials
UI: Dashboard Overview Tab - Shows stats cards and role breakdown
UI: Dashboard Volunteers Tab - Shows volunteer table with filters
UI: Dashboard Attendance Tab - Shows attendance tracking with date selector
UI: Dashboard Users Tab - Shows user management (Chief Marshal only)
UI: Add User Modal - Opens and shows form fields
seed_data_creation: Multiple test volunteers created during testing with TEST_ prefix in names/emails
context_for_next_testing_agent: Volunteer registration and marshal dashboard features fully tested. Backend uses localStorage for session management (not cookies due to CORS). Default chief marshal account is seeded on startup. Test volunteers have TEST_ prefix for easy identification. All RBAC tests passed - viewers cannot approve/reject or create users.
